title: Frequently Asked Questions - GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

questions.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a skincare serum with 10% Vitamin C, designed for Oily and Combination skin types.

questions.question: What concentration of Vitamin C does this serum contain?
Which skin types is this product suitable for?
questions.answer: This product is suitable for Oily and Combination skin types.

questions.question: Can I use this if I have sensitive skin?
questions.answer: Users with sensitive skin may experience mild tingling for sensitive skin. It's recommended to perform a patch test first.

questions.question: How do I use this serum?
questions.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

questions.question: When should I apply this serum in my routine?
questions.answer: Apply in the morning before sunscreen, after cleansing and toning.

questions.question: How many drops should I use?
Can I use this serum daily?
questions.answer: Yes, this serum is designed for daily use in your morning skincare routine.

questions.question: Do I need to use sunscreen with this serum?
questions.answer: Yes, always follow with sunscreen when using vitamin C products in the morning.

questions.question: What is the price of this serum?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹699.

questions.question: Is this product worth the investment?
questions.answer: At ₹699, this serum offers brightening, fades dark spots benefits with quality ingredients like Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: How does this compare to other Vitamin C serums?
questions.answer: This serum stands out with its 10% Vitamin C formulation combined with Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: What are the key ingredients?
questions.answer: The key ingredients are Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: What does Hyaluronic Acid do in this formula?
questions.answer: Hyaluronic Acid provides hydration and helps the skin retain moisture.

questions.question: What are the main benefits of this serum?
questions.answer: The main benefits include brightening and fades dark spots.

questions.question: How long until I see results?
questions.answer: With consistent use, you may start seeing brightening effects within 2-4 weeks.
